issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: This jira proposes to move startFile() and related functions into FSDirWriteFileOp.
fields.summary: Move startFile() and related operations into FSDirWriteFileOp

comments.body:
Are you rewriting HDFS in C-style all statics?
What is the reason for that? [Previously commented here|https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-8394?focusedCommentId=14548397&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-14548397]
